name: Hearthfire's Trail
desc: Arlecchino's specialty. The raw meat, bereft of any excessive seasoning, brings a rush of both blood and brutal freshness, engraving an elegant ensemble of flavors on your tongue. The final aftertaste is cleaner and neater still, a mirror reflection of how its maker handles certain situations...

value.text: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.

customize.name: Recipe: Steak Tartare
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Steak Tartare.

customize.name: Steak Tartare
customize.desc: A dish of fresh raw meat. Choice meat that has been minced and seasoned goes perfectly well with raw egg yolk. It is unknown who came up with the idea. It might be a starving adventurer's desperate attempt at keeping their belly full.

customize.name: Arlecchino
customize.desc: "The Knave," Fourth of the Fatui Harbingers. A poised, ruthless diplomat. To the children in the House of the Hearth, she is their feared yet dependable "Father."

customize.name: Hearthfire's Trail
customize.desc: Arlecchino's specialty. The raw meat, bereft of any excessive seasoning, brings a rush of both blood and brutal freshness, engraving an elegant ensemble of flavors on your tongue. The final aftertaste is cleaner and neater still, a mirror reflection of how its maker handles certain situations...

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Bird Egg
customize.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Marcotte
customize.desc: A pink flower with a pearl-like luster and rich scent profile. It is one of the most important ingredients in a perfumer's arsenal.
